Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
30.09.2008 GB SCR13991 Added test that DEBH_DELETIONBLOCKED (old) = Y
16.11.2004 SH SCR7341 Added new test "Deletion not allowed, this debtor is used
for bank & BANK_LEDG_NO"
03.11.2004 SH SCR5825 Added PI.USER as arguement for BXA031
19.10.2004 SH SCR7204 Added new test 6 and extended tests 5 with
DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT <> 2 ( for old and new debtor)
14.10.2004 JJ SCR7187 -Added new checks 4 and 5
-Renumbered ODH020 checks from 4+ to O.1 , O.2 etc to prevent confusion
-- Reset virtuals
-- 1. Test if old debtor exists in DEBH
-- 2. Test if new debtor exists in DEBH
-- 3. Test if old debtor exists in DHDU (debtor already handled)
-- 5. Old debtor has commercial/legal connections
-- 5. New debtor has commercial/legal connections
-- 6. Debtors have different legal owners
@ Block of same tests as in ODH202 (uses messages from MESG, with same IDs as
used in OPH020, prevents double maintenance and translations)
-- O.1 Both debtors (old and new) have to be unequal
-- O.2 New debtor is a branch office while old debtor is not
-- O.3 Not allowed for debtors in different countries
-- O.4 Check if pending payments exists for the old debtor heller
... O.4.1 not allowed if there are pending automatic collections
... O.4.2 not allowed because there are pending payment schedules
... O.4.3 not allowed because there are pending payments
-- O.5. Not allowed because there is legal collection
-- O.6 Not allowed because there is different Heller reinsurance
-- O.7 Not allowed because one of the debtor has negative indication
-- 0.8 Deletion not allowed, old debtor is used for other banks
-- Updates if no errors occured
... store row to DHDU
... start merging debtor hellers
... update T203 fields to inform users about database updates
-- Update T203_HANDELD = 'Y' to allow restarts

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Old debtor has commercial or legal connections')
MlsTrans ('New debtor has commercial or legal connections')

Text.val: @ See endtask condition, if one of three tests becomes TRUE then
stop program
-- Check on BTPC_STATUS < 2, then LOCATE TO = 1
-- If exists a TACO row of any debtor client of the old debtor heller then merge
is not allowed
-- If exists a PAYS row of any debtor client of the old debtor heller then merge
is not allowed
-- If exists a BTPC row of any debtor client of the old debtor heller then merge
is not allowed
... only if all T203 rows were handeld
